GET /api.description: Serves up a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of the API

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics

GET /api/article/:article_id.description: Serves article object with specified ID

article.title: Title of Article
article.author: Author McAuthorface
article.body: Read me. Read me. Read me.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updated the votes on specified article. Serves the entire updated article

exampleResponse.message: Added comment to article with ID: 5

updatedArticle.title: Title of Article
updatedArticle.author: Author McAuthorface
updatedArticle.body: This article used to have 100 votes

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles without their body, sorted decending by creation

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of all comments on specified article

exampleResponse.message: All comments on article of ID: 23

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds comment to specied article and serves the added comment

exampleResponse.message: Added comment to article with ID: 5

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes specified comment. Responds with nothing
